metadata.title: CVE-2020-12659 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.6.7. xdp_umem_reg innet/xdp/xdp_umem.c has an out-of-bounds write (by a user with theCAP_NET_ADMIN capability) because of a lack of headroom validation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12659` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
No subscription required

linux-image-5.3.0-59-generic - 5.3.0-59.53~18.04.1
linux-image-5.3.0-59-generic-lpae - 5.3.0-59.53~18.04.1
